column4: Hi. When i log into ubuntu  (7.10, fully updated) my gnome session starts and shows desktop icons, top panel, buttom panel, some if not all desktop icons for a second or so. Next, it's only the background (again, also for a few seconds) and then everything pops up again and functions perfectly.  Any idea how to get rid of this?
i'll try and see if it works.
thank you, that was it. Setting appearance to the lowest possible solves the issue. Thanks!
